images.copyright: Polar bear investigating a camera, Churchill, Manitoba, Canada (© Matthias Breiter/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Nosing in on a polar bear pair
images.caption: Polar bears
images.desc: Welcome to Churchill, Manitoba, population 899 (if you don't count the bears, or the many human visitors who come around this time each year to glimpse the world's largest land carnivore).
images.bsTitle: Nosing in on a polar bear pair
